resources.string:
Persons with Owner Password have Full Control over the PDF.
They can set permissions regarding whether the file can be printed, modified, extracted etc.

Persons with User Password can only view the PDF and performs operations as specified by Owner.
Enter comma separate ranges.\nExample : 1 – 5, 5 – 10, 11 will create 3 PDF\'s with pages 1 to 5, 5 to 10 and page 11.\nRange : 10 - 5 will contains pages from 5 - 10 in reverse order.
